page.title: 02EDUCATION LONG PRESTON
page.content: A small school with just two classes having approximately 20 children in each class. The new entrants stay in the first class from reception to top infants, ages 5,6,7.The second class is for the junior ages that is 8,9,10. Most of the children live in the village and walk to school but a few living at Halton West or outlying farms are brought to school by minibus. The two classroom areas are seperated by a large school hall and each has its own cloakroom and toilet facilities.There is an additional room which serves as a library,T.V.room, junior art room and provides a quiet space for individual or group activities. At the age of 11 the children transfer to Settle Middle School.
